content.question: The article recommends which of the following in regard to disposing of plastic bags?

choices.label: Use special containers to recycle plastic bags.
Do not mix plastic bags with other waste.
Reuse plastic bags until they break.
Collect and then burn plastic bags.

content.answer: Do not mix plastic bags with other waste.
